tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_campaign (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  expense_description TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_campaigns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_expenses (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES guerrilla_marketing_campaigns(id),
    expense_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    expense_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES guerrilla_marketing_campaigns(id),
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    total_revenue DECIMAL,
    profit_margin DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_tracking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_campaign_budgets (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  expense_description VARCHAR,
  expense_amount DECIMAL,
  expense_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  expenses_total DECIMAL,
  budget_allocated DECIMAL,
  remaining_budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_channels (
  channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  channel_name VARCHAR,
  channel_type VARCHAR,
  channel_cost DECIMAL,
  target_audience VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  performance_metric VARCHAR,
  metric_value DECIMAL,
  target_value DECIMAL
)
